event.title: 2000, Camden had a population of 13,154, but it lost

data.event: In 2000, Camden had a population of 13,154, but it lost 7.4 percent of its residents and recorded 12,183 in 2010.

event.title: had lived along the rivers of Arkansas for thousands of years

data.event: Indigenous peoples of various cultures had lived along the rivers of Arkansas for thousands of years and created complex societies.
